settings.title: Nomad VS Starlink
settings.description:
For your convenience, we have conducted a survey among RV Internet users and compiled a comparative table using two popular providers of these services as examples.

*The table is based on the results of the user surveys of March 2023. The data will be updated semiannually

settings.html: We hope our comparison chart has helped you decide which provider is right for your needs!

settings.title: What is Nomad Internet?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet is America's largest Wireless Internet Service
Provider. We are focused on providing High-Speed wireless Internet to
rural communities all over the country and on-the-road travelers!

settings.title: How does Nomad Internet work?
settings.content:
Instead of using traditional Internet wires, we do it by
transmitting wireless Internet access directly to your home, business,
and even while traveling! We combine the latest technology with
Verizon’s service to provide high-speed internet to rural locations and
traveling nomads. We offer a variety
of internet plans, allowing you to choose one that fits your needs.

settings.title: Do I need to sign a contract to use Nomad Internet?
settings.content: No contract with Nomad Internet. You get to choose the subscription plan that’s best for you.

settings.title: Is Nomad Internet secure?
settings.content:
Yes, all Nomad Internet modems let you use public IPs.
Multiple layers of encryption, enhanced Wi-Fi security, firewall
filtering, built-in VPN support, IT admin controls, and other features
deliver strong security at every level.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for gaming?
settings.content:
Yes. Even if you are in the most remote location, we will
provide you with robust and reliable internet for all your gaming needs.
No matter your plan, you can expect fast internet with low ping rates
and latency.

settings.title: Can I use Nomad Internet for RVing?
settings.content:
Nomad Internet users can take the same high-speed,
low-latency service they have at home to any location Nomad Internet has
coverage. Nomad Internet for RVers/travelers will allow users to pause
and un-pause service based on their individual travel needs.

settings.title: Answers to the most frequently asked questions

settings.name: Amanda Ramirez
settings.text: After searching for wireless internet providers in my area and hearing good things about Nomad Internet, I decided to give them a try. I have the Nomad Raptor modem that they provided and it is working like a charm! My home is in a rural area, but I am still able to get high-speed internet. All of my friends and family are very impressed with Nomad Internet, and so am I!

settings.name: David Moore
settings.text: Finding wireless broadband internet providers that provide a dependable quality of service can be tough, especially if you live in a rural home. After months of research, I stumbled upon Nomad Internet and I couldn't be more pleased with my choice. Their Raptor modem gave me high speed connection despite being in an isolated place and they even offer an Air modem if your needs are basic or you want a mobile solution. Overall, I'm very pleased with the services Nomad provides for rural homes like mine needing wireless broadband internet.

settings.name: Kelsey Walls
settings.text: I recently had the pleasure of trying out Nomad Internet, one of the best wireless broadband service providers on the market. It's been incredibly convenient to use their modem nomad air - it has allowed us to stay connected to high speed internet even in our rural home! I'm absolutely enamored with the idea of having their third device, the Ark, as a backup option; it makes me that much more comfortable knowing I won't be left without an internet connection. Nomad Internet is easily my favorite choice for wireless broadband!
